35 /* Authors: Robert Haschke, Michael Goerner
36  Desc: Move to joint-state or Cartesian goal pose

39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/stages/move_to.h>

48 
49 MoveTo::MoveTo(const std::string& name, const solvers::PlannerInterfacePtr& planner)
50  : PropagatingEitherWay(name), planner_(planner) {
51  auto& p = properties();
52  p.property("timeout").setDefaultValue(1.0);
53  p.declare<std::string>("group", "name of planning group");
54  p.declare<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("ik_frame", "frame to be moved towards goal pose");
55  p.declare<boost::any>("goal", "goal specification");
56  // register actual types
57  PropertySerializer<std::string>();
58  PropertySerializer<moveit_msgs::RobotState>();
59  PropertySerializer<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>();
60  PropertySerializer<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>();
61 
62  p.declare<moveit_msgs::Constraints>("path_constraints", moveit_msgs::Constraints(),
63  "constraints to maintain during trajectory");
64 }
65 
66 void MoveTo::setIKFrame(const Eigen::Isometry3d& pose, const std::string& link) {
67  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_msg;
68  pose_msg.header.frame_id = link;
69  tf::poseEigenToMsg(pose, pose_msg.pose);
70  setIKFrame(pose_msg);
71 }
72 
73 void MoveTo::setGoal(const std::map<std::string, double>& joints) {
74  moveit_msgs::RobotState robot_state;
75  robot_state.joint_state.name.reserve(joints.size());
76  robot_state.joint_state.position.reserve(joints.size());
77 
78  for (auto& joint : joints) {
79  robot_state.joint_state.name.push_back(joint.first);
80  robot_state.joint_state.position.push_back(joint.second);
81  }
82  robot_state.is_diff = true;
83  setProperty("goal", robot_state);
84 }
85 
86 void MoveTo::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
87  PropagatingEitherWay::init(robot_model);
88  planner_->init(robot_model);
89 }
90 
91 bool MoveTo::getJointStateGoal(const boost::any& goal, const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg,
92  moveit::core::RobotState& state) {
93  try {
94  // try named joint pose
95  const std::string& named_joint_pose = boost::any_cast<std::string>(goal);
96  if (!state.setToDefaultValues(jmg, named_joint_pose))
97  throw InitStageException(*this, "Unknown joint pose: " + named_joint_pose);
98  state.update();
99  return true;
100  } catch (const boost::bad_any_cast&) {
101  }
102 
103  try {
104  // try RobotState
105  const moveit_msgs::RobotState& msg = boost::any_cast<moveit_msgs::RobotState>(goal);
106  if (!msg.is_diff)
107  throw InitStageException(*this, "Expecting a diff state");
108 
109  // validate specified joints
110  const auto& accepted = jmg->getJointModelNames();
111  for (const auto& name : msg.joint_state.name)
112  if (std::find(accepted.begin(), accepted.end(), name) == accepted.end())
113  throw InitStageException(*this, "Joint '" + name + "' is not part of group '" + jmg->getName() + "'");
114  for (const auto& name : msg.multi_dof_joint_state.joint_names)
115  if (std::find(accepted.begin(), accepted.end(), name) == accepted.end())
116  throw InitStageException(*this, "Joint '" + name + "' is not part of group '" + jmg->getName() + "'");
117 
118  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(msg, state, false);
119  return true;
120  } catch (const boost::bad_any_cast&) {
121  }
122 
123  return false;
124 }
125 
126 bool MoveTo::getPoseGoal(const boost::any& goal, const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& ik_pose_msg,
127  const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, Eigen::Isometry3d& target_eigen,
128  decltype(std::declval<SolutionBase>().markers()) & markers) {
129  try {
130  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& target = boost::any_cast<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(goal);
131  tf::poseMsgToEigen(target.pose, target_eigen);
132 
133  // transform target into global frame
134  const Eigen::Isometry3d& frame = scene->getFrameTransform(target.header.frame_id);
135  target_eigen = frame * target_eigen;
136 
137  // frame at target pose
138  rviz_marker_tools::appendFrame(markers, target, 0.1, "ik frame");
139 
140  // frame at link
141  rviz_marker_tools::appendFrame(markers, ik_pose_msg, 0.1, "ik frame");
142  } catch (const boost::bad_any_cast&) {
143  return false;
144  }
145  return true;
146 }
147 
148 bool MoveTo::getPointGoal(const boost::any& goal, const moveit::core::LinkModel* link,
149  const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, Eigen::Isometry3d& target_eigen,
150  decltype(std::declval<SolutionBase>().markers()) & /*unused*/) {
151  try {
152  const geometry_msgs::PointStamped& target = boost::any_cast<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>(goal);
153  Eigen::Vector3d target_point;
154  tf::pointMsgToEigen(target.point, target_point);
155 
156  // transform target into global frame
157  const Eigen::Isometry3d& frame = scene->getFrameTransform(target.header.frame_id);
158  target_point = frame * target_point;
159 
160  // retain link orientation
161  target_eigen = scene->getCurrentState().getGlobalLinkTransform(link);
162  target_eigen.translation() = target_point;
163 
164  // TODO: add marker visualization
165  } catch (const boost::bad_any_cast&) {
166  return false;
167  }
168  return true;
169 }
170 
171 bool MoveTo::compute(const InterfaceState& state, planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene, SubTrajectory& solution,
172  Direction dir) {
173  scene = state.scene()->diff();
174  const robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model = scene->getRobotModel();
175  assert(robot_model);
176 
177  const auto& props = properties();
178  double timeout = this->timeout();
179  const std::string& group = props.get<std::string>("group");
180  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model->getJointModelGroup(group);
181  if (!jmg) {
182  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("MoveTo", "Invalid joint model group: " << group);
183  return false;
184  }
185  boost::any goal = props.get("goal");
186  if (goal.empty()) {
187  ROS_WARN_NAMED("MoveTo", "goal undefined");
188  return false;
189  }
190 
191  const auto& path_constraints = props.get<moveit_msgs::Constraints>("path_constraints");
192  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr robot_trajectory;
193  bool success = false;
194 
195  if (getJointStateGoal(goal, jmg, scene->getCurrentStateNonConst())) {
196  // plan to joint-space target
197  success = planner_->plan(state.scene(), scene, jmg, timeout, robot_trajectory, path_constraints);
198  } else { // Cartesian goal
199  const moveit::core::LinkModel* link;
200  Eigen::Isometry3d target_eigen;
201 
202  // Cartesian targets require an IK reference frame
203  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped ik_pose_msg;
204  const boost::any& value = props.get("ik_frame");
205  if (value.empty()) { // property undefined
206  // determine IK link from group
207  if (!(link = jmg->getOnlyOneEndEffectorTip())) {
208  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("MoveTo", "Failed to derive IK target link");
209  return false;
210  }
211  ik_pose_msg.header.frame_id = link->getName();
212  ik_pose_msg.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
213  } else {
214  ik_pose_msg = boost::any_cast<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(value);
215  if (!(link = robot_model->getLinkModel(ik_pose_msg.header.frame_id))) {
216  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("MoveTo", "Unknown link: " << ik_pose_msg.header.frame_id);
217  return false;
218  }
219  }
220 
221  if (!getPoseGoal(goal, ik_pose_msg, scene, target_eigen, solution.markers()) &&
222  !getPointGoal(goal, link, scene, target_eigen, solution.markers())) {
223  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("MoveTo", "Invalid type for goal: " << goal.type().name());
224  return false;
225  }
226 
227  // transform target pose such that ik frame will reach there if link does
228  Eigen::Isometry3d ik_pose;
229  tf::poseMsgToEigen(ik_pose_msg.pose, ik_pose);
230  target_eigen = target_eigen * ik_pose.inverse();
231 
232  // plan to Cartesian target
233  success = planner_->plan(state.scene(), *link, target_eigen, jmg, timeout, robot_trajectory, path_constraints);
234  }
235 
236  // store result
237  if (robot_trajectory) {
238  scene->setCurrentState(robot_trajectory->getLastWayPoint());
239  if (dir == BACKWARD)
240  robot_trajectory->reverse();
241  solution.setTrajectory(robot_trajectory);
242 
243  // set cost
244  double cost = 0;
245  for (const double& distance : robot_trajectory->getWayPointDurations()) {
246  cost += distance;
247  }
248  solution.setCost(cost);
249 
250  if (!success)
251  solution.markAsFailure();
252 
253  return true;
254  }
255  return false;
256 }
257 
258 void MoveTo::computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) {
259  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr to;
260  SubTrajectory trajectory;
261 
262  if (compute(from, to, trajectory, FORWARD))
263  sendForward(from, InterfaceState(to), std::move(trajectory));
264  else
265  silentFailure();
266 }
267 
268 void MoveTo::computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) {
269  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr from;
270  SubTrajectory trajectory;
271 
272  if (compute(to, from, trajectory, BACKWARD))
273  sendBackward(InterfaceState(from), to, std::move(trajectory));
274  else
275  silentFailure();
276 }
